name: In Pursuit with John Walsh
overview: Victims' rights activist John Walsh and his son, Callahan, showcase time-sensitive, unsolved cases in desperate need of attention, mobilizing the public to engage in the pursuit of justice.

episodes.name: Tragic Entanglement
episodes.overview: Luis Frias makes John Walsh's most-wanted list after allegedly stabbing his common-law wife to death in front of their children; Callahan Walsh explores the case of Harold Butch Knight, who left a trail of clues after confessing to killing his wife.

episodes.name: Campus Tragedy
episodes.overview: John Walsh spotlights freshman Jihad Ramadan, who allegedly introduces a knife to a fistfight that claims a star college student's life. Later, Callahan Walsh looks for Thayne Smika, who, police believe, shoots his roommate in cold blood over back rent.

episodes.name: Deadly Poser
episodes.overview: Raymond "R.J." McLeod seems like a knight in shining armor to one single mom, but as John Walsh reveals, she was far from safe. Callahan Walsh discovers how rapper Maurice Nesbitt's constant abuse of his girlfriend eventually turns deadly.

episodes.name: Crocodile Tears
episodes.overview: Salvador Vaca Garcia tearfully appears on local news when his girlfriend vanishes. John Walsh scrutinizes Garcia's story. Later, Callahan Walsh looks at Brian Keith Freeman who allegedly killed his fiancé when their engagement fell apart.

episodes.name: Deadly Reunion
episodes.overview: John Walsh investigates a whirlwind romance and the accusation that Lamont Stephenson strangled his fiancé and her dog. Callahan Walsh explores claims that Gloria Schulze is a freeloader drunk driver who repeatedly cheats the legal system.

episodes.name: Deadly Double Life
episodes.overview: John Walsh profiles Mike Bullinger's secret double life that police believe ended in a triple homicide. Callahan Walsh looks at the case of Tomas Magallon Gonzalez, who allegedly abused his stepdaughter for years before taking her life.

episodes.name: When Good Meets Evil
episodes.overview: John Walsh profiles Juan Lazaro Abrego who is believed to have murdered his ex-girlfriend, a beloved teacher. Callahan Walsh investigates Derek Dean, a St. Louis man accused of shooting a pair of twins, killing one and wounding the other.

episodes.name: The Escape Artist
episodes.overview: John Walsh follows the story of Glen Stark Chambers, who killed his girlfriend and then escaped prison (not once but twice); Callahan Walsh follows Jesus Salazar, a suspect of murder who eludes capture for decades.

episodes.name: Savage Soldier
episodes.overview: John Walsh profiles John Blauvelt, a U.S. Army vet who is accused of waging a lethal war against his young wife. Callahan Walsh looks at Rudy Fernandez, whose teen romance with his high school sweetheart is believed to have turned deadly.

episodes.name: Deadly Daughter
episodes.overview: Alicia Osibin's neighbors trusted her, but John Walsh looks at whether she may be responsible for her own mother's murder. Callahan speaks with Andrea, alleged victim of Frederick McLean's abuse, who is still desperate for McLean's capture.

episodes.name: Murder in Appalachia
episodes.overview: John Walsh investigates how Eric Jones, the son of a preacher, allegedly turned to murder. Later, Callahan Walsh tries to make sense of how a dispute over a dog could provoke Ricardo Villanueva Cordova to reportedly commit murder in broad daylight.

episodes.name: Stolen Life
episodes.overview: John Walsh explores the case of conman Edgardo Perez who allegedly preyed on older men until it turned deadly. Callahan Walsh heads to Boulder where teenage babysitter Chris Deininger confessed to abusing 29 kids in his care before fleeing.

episodes.name: American Nightmare
episodes.overview: John follows the trail of fugitive Leroy Headley whose 911 call sends police down a dark and twisting path that unravels a history of violence. Cal uncovers hidden truths behind the case of Jeffrey Forrest, a dangerous sexual predator on the run.

episodes.name: Lying in Wait
episodes.overview: John is in pursuit of William Strand -- police say he killed his ex-girlfriend who was also the mother of his son. Later, Cal hunts for Leslie Lagrotta, a suspect accused of sexually assaulting women in central Florida for over a decade.

episodes.name: Collateral Damage
episodes.overview: John is in pursuit of suspect Jonathan Dorado, wanted for killing a woman and her unborn child in an act of misplaced gang revenge; Cal hunts for Henry Houston, accused of conning a vulnerable woman and later killing her father in an altercation.

episodes.name: Stolen Innocence
episodes.overview: When a man is senselessly gunned down at a party, police learn it may be a case of mistaken identity; John joins the hunt for suspect Colin Jerrick; Cal helps police hunt David Bonness, accused of sexually abusing his former stepdaughter.

episodes.name: Unforgotten
episodes.overview: John joins the search for Celina Mays, whose disappearance draws police attention to her family-run, allegedly cult-like church; Cal hunts for Efren Meza, who was accused of stalking and stabbing his ex-girlfriend.

episodes.name: Evil Deception
episodes.overview: When a young girl goes missing after a night out in Vegas, police suspect her friend Erick Rangel-Ibarra; Cal goes after Jerold Dunning, accused of sexually abusing his girlfriend's daughter for years.

episodes.name: Bloodshed and Blackmail
episodes.overview: John helps police track down Glen Holmes, accused of carjacking a couple and murdering one of them. Later, Cal joins the hunt for online predator Adrian Fierros, who coerces young girls into sending him explicit photos that he uses to extort them.

episodes.name: A Broken Bond
episodes.overview: When a young father is executed, police learn the shooter may have been his close childhood friend. John helps track down the alleged killer, Diontae Whitson. Later, Cal's in pursuit of Louis Rojas, accused of murdering his ex-wife's new husband.

episodes.name: A Father's Betrayal
episodes.overview: John joins the hunt for Arturo Munguia, aka Jesse Vega, accused of murdering his girlfriend in an act of petty jealousy. Later, Cal helps track down Rex Byrnes, an unemployed metalhead whose own daughter accuses him of years of sexual abuse.

episodes.name: Deadly Secrecy
episodes.overview: John goes after Eduardo Clemente, the prime suspect in his girlfriend's murder after her body turns up in the desert; Cal visits North Carolina to hunt down Emigdio Ramirez Garcia, accused of ruthlessly murdering his wife in 1997.

episodes.name: Murder At The Mall
episodes.overview: John is in pursuit of Jolene Hibbs and Charles Ausiello, a couple accused of murdering a retiree and selling off his assets; John and Cal team up to hunt for the mysterious Boca Raton Mall murderer who terrified South Florida in 2007.

episodes.name: Blindsided
episodes.overview: John hunts Omar Cardenas, the prime suspect in the murder of a devoted father who may have been caught in a random act of gang retaliation. Later, Cal heads to Pennsylvania to track Justin Smith, accused of murdering his pregnant girlfriend.

episodes.name: Last Ride
episodes.overview: John hunts for Jose Bustos-Diaz, a convicted killer and prison escapee suspected in another slaying. Later, Cal's in pursuit of Benjamin Williams, accused of murdering his ex-girlfriend in front of her two young children, including his own baby.

episodes.name: Road Trip Killer
episodes.overview: John is on the trail of fugitive Larry Hicks, accused of murdering a devoted mother of two in Plattsburgh, N.Y.; Callahan heads to Texas to shine the white-hot spotlight on accused predator Steven Leifeste.

episodes.name: Dead of Winter
episodes.overview: In pursuit of Dylan Harrington, John takes on a bone-chilling murder case in remote Washington State.

episodes.name: Blood in the Streets
episodes.overview: John joins law enforcement in pursuit of Luis Montes, accused of murdering his on-again-off-again girlfriend in Texas; Callahan heads to Chicago to shine a light on two victims of gun violence whose cases remain unsolved.

episodes.name: Masked Murderer
episodes.overview: John and Callahan hunt down John Galvao-Sahb and Dublas Gonzalez.
